newsitem.title: USA: Trenwick stake cut by group led by Sosnoff.
newsitem.headline: Trenwick stake cut by group led by Sosnoff.

text.p: A group led by New York investor Martin Sosnoff said Friday it reduced its stake in Trenwick Group Inc to the equivalent of 4.872 percent or 330,960 common shares.
In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it sold 15,500 shares of Trenwick between July 25 and September 17 at prices ranging from $49.50 to $53.125 a share.
In addition, it said it sold $293,000 in Trenwick debentures. The debentures are convertible into common stock.
The group said its remaining stake included 424,300 common shares and $4.3 million in debentures, convertible into 88,660 common shares.
